body.name: Bear Air Fryer, 5.3Qt for Quick and Oil-Free Healthy Meals, Easy View, Smart Digital Touchscreen, Shake Reminder, Dishwasher-Safe&Non-stick Basket, Disposable Paper Liner and Recipes included,White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
features: [Indulge In Quick And Healthy Meals]：Bear air fryer oven with unique steam-baking technique and 4d stereo hot air circulation - achieve perfect golden finish, crispy, tender, and up to 85%-90% less oil results every time!

[Effortless Cooking]: Enjoy one-touch convenience with 8 preset modes on the big display. Customize your recipes with intuitive digital control, adjustable time, and temperature. Don't worry to mess up the food, "shake reminder "ensures evenly cooked, crispy results

[Suitable Capacity]: This compact air fryer holds 5.3 quarts of cooking space, accommodating 1.5 pounds of french fries or a 6" pizza. Ideal for 2-4 people. Countertop-friendly size and fresh outlook make it an excellent kitchen appliance for your family!
[Easy-view Window Monitoring]：Watch your food fry with ease using the clearcook window and internal light of our air fryer - no need to open the basket

[Hassle-free Cleanup]: Simply wipe down the exterior with a damp cloth after cooking. The removable nonstick baskets tray, made with food-grade material, is dishwasher safe and free of pfoa and bpa. Non-slip feet ensure safety and stability during cooking

Time and temperature can also be freely adjusted according to food portions *Several menus with shake reminder 6.3-inch Viewing Window No need to open the pull-out basket to monitor food status at any time, so as to make adjustments to the baking

What is the wattage? 1500 watt How about the capacity? 5L/5.3qt What are the inner dimensions of the basket? 8.4"X4.8" Does this have Teflon coating? The coating materials for the cooking tray contain PTFE, also known as Teflon, and these coatings are PFOA-free. Should I remove the rubber caps on grill？ These rubber parts are usually there to prevent the fryer from slipping during use and also help reduce friction and vibrations. They're safe and non-toxic. Please don't worry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, air fries perfectly, has a nice touch screen, a clear window, and very easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My oldest air fryer gave out, and I looked for a new and improved one. I found this one with a really nice design and good specs, and I had to try one. I was not disappointed; this one has worked out great. First off, very easy to use. I like how there are nice cooking presets that make it easy and a good touchscreen control display where every function beeps and functions as soon as it is touched. I also like how I can adjust the time and the temperature manually as well. Secondly, I really like this basket. The basket has an insert that stands above the bottom of the bucket enough for air to circulate through. With that in mind, doing french fries, not only does the top get crispy, but so does the bottom too. The cooking is right on point for air fryer instructions on various foods that I have tried, including french fries, and cooked to perfection. I also like how the bucket is non-stick, and the food rolls out without sticking to the bottom. Lastly, I like how easily this one cleans up. All I do is remove the insert, stick it in the dishwasher along with the bucket, and it all comes back looking brand new again. No cons, it worked out great for me, and I am very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace my old one that no longer worked. I wasn't going to replace it because I seldom used it but decided to anyway because I'm trying to use my propane stove less. Anyway, I'm glad I did. it works better and faster than my old one. It is attractive and smaller so I can leave it on the counter if I want to and I love that I can see inside while it's cooking. Tots were actually crunchy in about 10 to 15 minutes, meatballs are the best and homemade empanadas were perfect. So far I am very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent performance, Concise appearance, easy operation
reviews.reviewText: Have been using a 1.2 Qt air fryer for over 3 years, and our oven has been hibernated since then. This is our 2nd air fryer but 1st big one for completely replacing the oven.Convenient, bigger capacity, easy cleaning. A huge visible window makes cooking more enjoyable and interesting. Concise and easy appearance, white match colors reveal it in the high-end product.No more time wasted on the pre-heating procedure, and no longer need to set the temperature manually by myself before cooking every time. The touchable control panel solves all the troublesome operation steps for me. Very good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like and don't like
reviews.reviewText: Color white see window, performance , clean up after easy like. Don't like. No beep when preheat is done no beep to shake.need better directions on touch screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer works wonderful ! ... and I was surprised @ how quiet it is ... I've cooked chicken to tator tots and everything tasted as it should .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make Healthy Food in Minutes!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. When my old air fryer kicked the bucket I replaced it pronto with this lil quick cooking gizmo. Not only does it make quick and oil-free healthy meals, but it also comes with a ton of great features that make it a must-have appliance in any kitchen (several features I didn't have on my old one).The easy view and smart 8 in 1 digital touchscreen is so convenient to use. It's super easy to navigate and select the perfect cooking settings for whatever I'm making. Whether I'm frying, roasting, or baking, this air fryer has a setting for it all.One feature that I absolutely love is the shake reminder (shake shake shake lol). It's so easy to forget to shake your food during cooking, but this air fryer takes care of that for you. It gives you a gentle reminder to shake your food halfway through the cooking process, ensuring that everything cooks evenly.Best feature - Cleaning up after cooking with this air fryer is a breeze. The non-stick basket is dishwasher-safe, making cleanup a quick and hassle-free experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This amazing Air Fry cooks just wonderfully, everything is beautiful, I admire it, it’s very easy to use, it cleans up very quickly without any problems, thank you, and the window that is there is a very convenient feature, you can see everything, I’m very glad that I bought it, I recommend it to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I was lucky enough to score a great deal on this air fryer for Black Friday and I’ve been really happy with the performance since I got it. The basket is huge and the light is bright so it’s easy to see how your food is doing. It’s a nice looking countertop appliance. I like that it has a low beeping sound to let you know it’s done. The actual cooking sound isn’t that bad either!I haven’t tried all the settings but it’s been great so far, allowed me to get rid of my toaster. I’ve used hand me down air fryers for the last 5 years — would for sure buy this as a house warming gift for anyone.There are a lot of bad reviews based on the fact that you have to follow the manual and do a first run through of the air fryer before using it. My recommendation— set it to run with all the windows open and have a fan on in the kitchen and not be there for 30mins. The chemical smell was gone within 30 when I did this. The smell was gone after doing this first cooking cycle. The manual explains why there’s a smell. Not that big of a deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, well-constructed for the price point.
reviews.reviewText: This has been my first air fryer, so I have nothing to compare it to. I picked this model over other models on Prime because of the ratings, and it was on sale at the time. Really happy with the illuminated interface on the top of the unit, the window to be able to watch it fry, and after skimming the user manual had no problems getting started. So far, I've used it for things like chicken nuggets and strips, and what I do is follow the length of time suggested on the box, but I leave it at around 380 degrees. This results in a crispy, well-cooked product for the few things I've tried so far. It has presets for fries and other items, but I haven't tried them yet. Really impressed with this Bear Air Fryer, and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: How Have I Lived Without This?!
reviews.reviewText: I was lamenting to a neighbor about not being able to cook using my oven as it gets too hot in my tiny little apartment (The a/c will not work unless its warmer than +10 outside and I have a oxygen concentrator that puts out a lot of heat!) No a/c means no oven use. He told me of his air fryer. He was leaving town for Christmas so he let me borrow his while he was gone. Game-changer! Once I returned his to him I immediately ordered myself this one. It cooks all sorts of foods without heating up the apartment. And its cooks the foods in about half the time. Example: pre-cooked frozen chicken wings - 450 in the oven for 30 minutes, apartment a sauna for hours v/s 390 in the air fryer for about 15 minutes and no change to apartment temperature. I may never use my oven again! This unit is very easy to use. The instructions make it more confusing than it has to be - its worded very poorly. And it is very easy to clean. It comes with air-fryer liners which means for the most part just a quick wipe with paper towels and its clean. I have used it quite a few times for different foods and have not had to actually wash the basket yet. But that will depend on what you actually cook in it. Do preheat it and let it cool down at least 2 times before using it to cook to rid it of funky smell (its some kind of protective oil on the heating coil that is described in the instruction manual) It says to do this once but I did it twice as I dont want my food to taste funky - and it didn't, in fact the breaded chicken wings were tastier and crisper than if they were cooked in the oven. And you will not believe how well this unit cooks frozen french fries. In minutes to crispy perfection! Little bit of a learning curve as I cook different things and figure out times and temperatures. Word of caution; do not put the basket with a liner in the unit when it still has time left to cook with no food in it - the hot air blows the liner up against the heating coil. The liner didn't actually catch fire, it was the oil on the liner that got hot enough to smoke! And lots of it! It does mention that in the instruction manual, just a mistake on my part. If you not sure you need or would use an air fryer, you do and you will, I wish I had discovered how great they are much sooner. Better late than never!
This is a great air fryer. Price is excellent, love the window in it, and very quiet to use. Good size for 2.

Encore en rodage mais après la première utilisation un peu difficile à nettoyer et de la buée se retrouve à l’intérieur de la vitre ! J’ai utilisé un contenant en silicone pour des frites et mauvais résultat! Cependant pas trop grosse et le modèle est très beau.De plus les instructions et les recettes, uniquement en anglais. DÉPLORABLE! Compagnie canadienne en plus! Pays bilingue…en principe.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and good quality
reviews.reviewText: It’s made in China and actually an excellent product. The quality is good, the machine is quiet, the window it has gives you a clear view of the cooking food. And believe me, it is not cheap at all and sells at a good price.
